description: Try our easy to follow Warmed Camembert recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked cheese,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Warmed Camembert Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue to medium heat (see tip). Place 2 x 25cm squares of foil on benchtop. Top with sheets of baking paper the same size.

Unwrap the camembert and make a 5-6 slashes in the top of each. Insert a few slices of garlic and some of the thyme into each cut. Scatter remaining thyme over the top. Drizzle with a little oil and season with cracked black pepper. Fold in sides of foil to form a parcel and seal edges.
Place camembert parcels on the coolest part of the barbecue. Cover with lid or roasting pan and cook for about 8 minutes or until camembert is soft in the centre. Serve warm with crackers.
